SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to retrieve the parameters for a particular instance of the Sponsorship Opportunity Eligibility Process
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS(@ID uniqueidentifier) as begin select so_eligibilityprocess.IDSETREGISTERID -- bp_view.ID as OUTPUTVIEWID from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS so_eligibilityprocess --join -- dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSVIEW bp_view on so_eligibilityprocess.QUERYVIEWID = bp_view.QUERYVIEWCATALOGID where so_eligibilityprocess.ID = @ID end
